name: Exploring The Spine 3D CD
descr: This is the perfect learning tool for anyone who wants to learn about the basic anatomy, diseases, and disorders of the spine. Vivid 3D computer-generated images clearly illustrate the features of each structure. The easy-to-understand text links to corresponding subjects. Features include rotating and still 3D models, mouse-over labeling, interactive quissing, and a gallery of images to print and use in presentations Topics, include: anatomy of the spine, kyphosis, scoliosis, lordosis, ankylosing spondylitis, spondylolisthesis, spinal cord damage, intrapelvic mass, osteoporosis, degeneration of the vertebrae, disc degeneration, herniated disc, pinched sciatic nerve, whiplash.
